title: Global automotive industry : capacity and assembly volume 2015/2022
summary: This grouped bar chart has 2 categories for the x axis of Country representing North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America.
The highest category is found at 2022 with a mean value of 23.52.
The second highest category is found at 2015 with a mean value of 20.93.
gold: This statistic represents the capacity of the global automobile production industry in 2015 and 2022 , by region . In 2022 , the North American industry is projected to have capacity of about 22.8 million units .
